channel.title: Auto Updater with Bluurs Client ? [HELP]
channel.description:
I know that there is an updater on bluurs client. I have a webclient and I'm wondering how I could get it to work so it auto downloads caches and it auto update.
Thanks, I would like to know how I can make it to work. :P
